column1: Piwik hostname, optionally including a path e.g. piwik.example.com or example.com/piwik
column2: Piwik hostname, opzionalmente include un percorso es. piwik.example.com o example.com/piwik

column1: Listed under Settings/Website in your Piwik administration panel
column2: Elencati in Impostazioni/Sito nel tuo pannello di amministrazione Piwik

column1: Enable tracking of outlinks and downloads
column2: Abilita tracking di outlinks e downloads

column1: Delay for link tracking in milliseconds
column2: Ritardo per il link tracking in millisecondi
